the first thing we need is some
wonderful milk now I'm using whole milk
today and this is five cups but if you
wanted to make a low-fat yogurt you
could certainly do that using low-fat
milk you can even use nonfat milk if you
would like but if you're like me and
you're looking for something that's
really rich and decadent which is
something that I love when I'm eating
yogurt you could do a blend of whole
milk and maybe a little bit of heavy
cream too you get something that's
really rich and unctuous and delicious
so it's really up to you kind of the
milk that you use but you need five cups

sure you buy a brand that has a lot of

that will be even better because you'll

in a pretty thick soft pot here and I

eighty to 185 degrees and you might be

that's true it is pasteurized and this
is totally great

all of the bacteria and you won't

there we are 116 degrees so this is

do is we now need to this is getting

a really delicate texture in terms of
